column4: hey im having troubles with this toshiba laptop with  Intel Corporation PRO/Wireless 3945ABG in a fresh and updated (via ethernet) install of 8.10
if someone could pm about this issue i would greatly appreciate it
it shows up in lshw and everythiing, but its greyed out in network manager
-> seems like the nm or gui fronts for configuring network in 8.10 is a bit faulty, does your wifi work if you use command line ?
im not sure could you help me see?
-> what does sudo iwlist wlan0 scan  tell you?
-> what does it say?
-> post your /etc/network/interfaces file
-> in pastebin
sorry
-> anyhow, put an entry for your wifi on that file,   auto wlan0;  iface wlan0 inet dhcp
do i need to do anything after that
-> try sudo ifup wlan0;
ifup interface wlan0 already configured
-> sudo dhclient wlan0
-> but now you have both your wifi and eth0 on same router, dont expect things to work correctly, as the packets will get confused as to which nic to take
-> yes?
ok sorry, any ideas?
-> i have plenty, what is the result of the command i told you?
its pretty long but basically no such device
-> learn to use the pastebin to post, if you dont want to cooperate, sorry.. cant help you
ok sorry i was just trying to refrain from setting up ppidgin on this laptop
-> you mentioned you have loaded the driver, you verified with sudo lshw -C network ?
